user.title: Crestron Home
user.description: Provide connection details for your Crestron Home controller.

data_description.api_token: Create this token in the controller UI under Settings → System Control Options → Web API Settings.
data_description.verify_ssl: Disable only when the controller uses a self-signed certificate.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the controller.

global_defaults.title: Global defaults
global_defaults.description: Configure defaults applied to every shade unless overridden.

data_description.invert: Enable when the Crestron controller reports 0% as fully open but Home Assistant expects 0% as fully closed.

select_shade.title: Select a shade
select_shade.description: Choose the shade whose calibration curve you want to edit.

edit_shade.title: Calibration for {shade_name}
edit_shade.description: Adjust anchors so the shade reports consistent visual positions. The first anchor must remain at 0% and the last at 100%.

data_description.invert_axis: Choose whether this shade should flip the visual axis relative to the global default.
data_description.action: Save changes or add/remove anchors before saving.
data_description.insert_after: Pick where the new anchor should be inserted when adding.
data_description.remove_index: Select which anchor to remove. The first and last anchors cannot be removed.

predictive_stop.title: Predictive Stop
predictive_stop.description: Enable or disable predictive stop planning and online learning.

reset_learning.title: Reset learned parameters
reset_learning.description: Select a shade to clear its learned speed and latency parameters.

error.anchors_too_few: Provide at least two anchors (0% and 100%).
error.anchors_endpoint: The first anchor must start at 0% and the last must end at 100%.
error.anchors_pc_range: Percent values must stay between 0 and 100 and increase for each anchor.
error.anchors_raw_range: Raw position values must stay between 0 and 65535.
error.anchors_pc_order: Anchor percentages must increase for each entry.
error.anchors_raw_monotonic: Raw values must never decrease between anchors.

error_write_failed.message: Failed to send commands to the controller.
